author: IGN
description: Watch the Gameplay Trailer for Spy Drops, a stealth action-adventure espionage game developed by Rainy Night Creations. Players will be taken back to a 90s style with top-down action controls being used to take on covert black operations with randomly generated missions to overcome. Make use of an array of weapons, upgrade attributes, and hack CCTVs to stay ahead of the game. Spy Drops is launching on July 31 for Nintendo Switch and PC (Steam).
title: Spy Drops - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Supercell and Brawl Stars went all out at San Diego Comic-Con 2025. They popped up a giant theme park filled with all sorts of carnival games, snacks, and even a ride to get you acclimated to all the excitement. Here's everything at the Brawl Stars Starr Park experience.

#IGN #SDCC #BrawlStars

author: IGN
description: Watch the Announcement Trailer for Toll Booth Simulator: Schedule of Chaos, a toll booth management game developed by SixRiz. Players will be responsible for the operations of a toll booth on a desert highway. Check authorizations for clearance, collect payments, and watch as chaos melts down under the beating sun. Toll Booth Simulator: Schedule of Chaos is coming soon to PC (Steam).

description:

Presented by Amazing Seasun Games
title: The Future of Mecha BREAK - Make or Break Ep. 3

author: IGN
description: Check out the Factory Driver Program Trailer for Project Motor Racing, an upcoming racing simulation series developed by Giants Software. Players can apply to become a factory test driver to aid in creating the next era of racing simulation through driver experience. Sign up for the Factory Driver Program now for Project Motor Racing, coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
title: Project Motor Racing - Official Factory Driver Program Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Hellwalker Difficulty and Secret Duo Boss Battle Demo Walkthrough for Phantom Blade Zero, an upcoming action hack-and-slash RPG developed by S-Game. Players can get a look at over 22 minutes of new gameplay featuring intense high-level gameplay on Hellwalker Difficulty mode and a Secret Duo Boss Battle. The gameplay shows off flashy and fast-paced combat against a suite of different enemies and bosses. Phantom Blade Zero is coming soon for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC.
title: Phantom Blade Zero - Official Hellwalker Difficulty & Secret Duo Boss Battle Demo Gameplay

author: IGN
description: 'There's no competition without rivals. But not all rivalries hinge on earning the title of champion.' Watch the Apex Legends: Showdown trailer for the upcoming season of the free-to-play battle royale game. Compete against your rivals when the Apex Legends: Showdown season comes to PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, and PC via the EA App, Epic Game Store, and Steam. A gameplay trailer for Apex Legends: Showdown is coming on July 30, 2025.
title: Apex Legends: Showdown - Official Cinematic Anthem Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The creators of Avatar: The Last Airbender, Michael Dante DiMartino and Bryan Konietzko, confirm a major piece of casting for the upcoming The Legend of Aang: The Last Airbender. Yes, Steven Yeun is in the movie, and no, it's probably not who you think.

Plus they talk about what we can expect from new animated series Avatar: Seven Havens, and give us an update on what's happening with the new The Last Airbender videogame.

Presented by NHTSA. Speeding Catches Up With You

#SDCC #IGN #AvatarTheLastAirbender
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender Creators Confirm Steven Yeun's Role in New Movie | SDCC 2025

description:

In this co-op action/horror FPS, you'll join the specialist group Nightfall to take on hordes of Zeds and fight for humanity's future. 

Presented by Killing Floor 3.

author: IGN
description:
Every mission shapes a legacy. Check out the Marvel Animation's Eyes of Wakanda trailer for this upcoming new action-adventure series. Produced in partnership with Proximity Media’s Zinzi Coogler, Sev Ohanian and Kalia King, Eyes of Wakanda follows the adventures of brave Wakandan warriors throughout history. All four episodes of Marvel Animation's Eyes of Wakanda will be available for streaming on Disney+ on August 1, 2025.

In this globe-trotting adventure, the heroes must carry-out dangerous missions to retrieve Vibranium artifacts from the enemies of Wakanda. They are the Hatut Zaraze and this is their story. 

Featuring the voices of Winnie Harlow, Cress Williams, Patricia Belcher, Larry Herron, Adam Gold, Lynn Whitfield, Jacques Colimon, Jona Xiao, Isaac Robinson-Smith, Gary Anthony Williams, Zeke Alton, Steve Toussaint and Anika Noni Rose, “Eyes of Wakanda” is helmed by director/executive producer Todd Harris, a director, producer and storyboard artist who has worked on some of
title: Eyes of Wakanda - Official Trailer (2025) Winnie Harlow, Cress Williams, Danai Gurira

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Features Trailer for the PlayStation FlexStrike Wireless Fight Stick, the first-party PlayStation fight stick developed by Sony. Players can take a more classic and traditional control scheme to their favorite fighting games, fitted with ultra-low latency, wireless connectivity with PlayStation Link or USB-C wired connection, a custom digital stick, mechanical switch buttons, and more. 

The PlayStation FlexStrike Wireless Fight Stick is coming soon for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC.

Marvel Tokon Fighting Souls launches in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam)

#IGN #PS5 #ArcadeStick
title: PlayStation FlexStrike Wireless Fight Stick - Official Features Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game Reviewed by Travis Northup on PC, also available on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch.

Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game is the Grima Wormtongue of games: it whispered many wonderful promises into my ear, but by the end I was left a wretched shadow of my former self. I tried my best to enjoy my time in the Shire, but these joy killing bugs and performance issues stopped me in my tracks. With life sim mechanics that are shallow as they come, terrible technical performance, and almost nothing original to say, Tales of the Shire disappoints every step of the way. There’s hints of a better game to be found in its slightly more robust cooking mechanics, as well as the occasionally amusing writing and dialogue that prove this setting was indeed ripe for a life sim if executed better – but like a Silmaril, those dreams have vanished deep in the depths of Angband.
title: Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game Review

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Webgrave Update Trailer for Witchfire, the hit first-person dark fantasy RPG shooter developed by The Astronauts. 

Players can soon access a brand new update fitted with a new, multi-layered region to scout and explore, a wealth of powerful new gear, a new system for expanding the Preyer’s abilities, new onboarding, and a number of fixes and quality improvements for players to enjoy. The Webgrave Update is also packed with a new difficulty option to turn up the fight for long-time fans. The Webgrave Update for Witchfire is available now for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Witchfire #TheAstronauts
title: Witchfire - Official Webgrave Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer for Avatar: Fire and Ash, the third installment in James Cameron's sci-fi drama action films distributed by 20th Century Studios. Venture to a new tribe on the planet of Pandora, a tribe that leads by fire and rage as their north star in all manners of life. Avatar: Fire and Ash is in theaters worldwide in IMAX 3D, Dolby Cinema 3D, RealD 3D, Cinemark XD, 4DX, ScreenX, and premium screens everywhere on December 19, 2025.

With Avatar: Fire and Ash, James Cameron takes audiences back to Pandora in an immersive new adventure with Marine turned Na’vi leader Jake Sully, Na’vi warrior Neytiri, and the Sully family. 

Avatar: Fire and Ash stars Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldaña, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang, and more. The film is directed by James Cameron alongside the screenplay by James Cameron & Rick Jaffa & Amanda Silver. The story is by James Cameron & Rick Jaffa & Amanda Silver & Josh Friedman & Shane Salerno, also stars Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang, Oona Chap
title: Avatar: Fire and Ash - Official Trailer (2025) Sam Worthington, Sigourney Weaver, Zoe Saldana

author: IGN
description:
The trials, the battles...have all led to this. Get ready to relive the journey of Tanjio Kamado. Check out the Demon Slayer - Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles 2 pre-launch trailer for this upcoming action game. Demon Slayer - Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles 2 covers everything up to and including the Hashira Training Arc, and the new trailer shows what you can expect. The trailer also showcases VS mode combat, including the reveal that the Infinity Castle Arc Character Pass will be arriving post-launch, and Muzan Kibutsuji will be available as a playable character in VS Mode via a free post-launch update. 

Demon Slayer - Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles 2 will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Nintendo Switch, Xbox, and Steam on August 5, 2025.

#IGN #DemonSlayer #Anime
title: Demon Slayer - Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles 2 - Official Pre-Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Release Date Announcement Trailer for Wander Stars, a turn-based anime narrative-driven RPG developed by Paper Castle Games. Players will embark on an action-packed adventure as Ringo looks for her brother Wolfe. Collect fragments of the Wanderstar map across 10 anime-inspired levels to find answers, make up for past mistakes, and take out enemies in stylized anime action. Wander Stars is launching on September 19 for Nintendo Switch and PC (Steam).

#IGN #WanderStars #AnimeGames
title: Wander Stars - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
We talked to Mafia: The Old Country developer Hangar 13's studio president Nick Baynes and game director Alex Cox about returning the Mafia series to its not-open-world roots, which games The Old Country takes design inspiration from, the plentiful amount of fruit found throughout the upcoming prequel, and more.

Mafia The Old Country launches August 8th 2025 for PC (Steam), PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S. 

#IGN #IGNFirst #MafiaTheOldCountry
title: Mafia: The Old Country Devs Discuss Returning the Series to its Roots – IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Developer Ludogram has announced Invokyr, a new four-player co-op psychological horror game where players must navigate and survive playing a cursed board game in an abandoned house. 
Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3883570/Invokyr/
title: Invokyr - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Due to decades of popularity, there’s always going to be new challengers stepping up to try and take the mantle of best survival horror game. Most fail, but when Bloober Team – fresh off the overwhelming success of their Silent Hill 2 remake – steps up with an original effort, you take notice.

That’s why I was eager to try out Cronos: The New Dawn. But does this rusty sci-fi, set in a futuristic Eastern European dystopia, have what it takes to make its own mark, or does it just merge into the pack? After playing the first two hours, the signs are there that Bloober Team could have a new survival horror hit on its hands, even if I do have some slight reservations.

#IGN #CronosTheNewDawn #SilentHill2Remake
title: Cronos: The New Dawn Hands-On Preview
